metadata.title: Northern Lights Candles Bottelabra Taper Holder, Pewter
features: Turn wine bottle into a taper holder instantly
Made of cast aluminum with pewter finish
Rubber rings ensure a snug fit
Enjoy your favorite wine bottles long after the wine is gone
description: Turn your favorite wine bottles into distinctive candelabra with our Bottelabra candle accessories. Designed to hold tealights or tapers, they are easy to use. Just push into almost any empty wine bottle; the rubber rings ensure a secure fit. Measures 3.25" x 5.5"

title: Northern Lights Wine Tealight Candle Gadget Review
amazon prime holiday deals #wedding
